::FZ/Zardus::

FZ's gaze met Halucigen's for a second or two, staying there and unaware of what would be staring back at him. Except for FZ wouldn't be the only one surprised at what he was staring at. What Halucigen would have seen, if he caught anything, would be the mind of a machine. A machine with computing power many many times that of a normal bot. A machine which controlled an entire battle cruiser. The Iron Fist. It towered inside FZ's mind, controlling his thoughts and actions. It wasn't a sentient being. That part was handled by a small part of Zardus's mind, somewhere behind and to the side of the part of FZ's mind that was the Iron Fist. (See his profile on nbwrpg.com to see how his mind got so weird).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Somewhere in the Iron Fist, Zardus sharply turns his head toward where FZ was standing, his eyes narrowing as he detects something strange through the phsychic link.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> Halucigen grasps the hand, trying to look into FZ's eyes.  To hold 
> his stare for just long enough to corrupt his mind for a few seconds. 
> To be able to scan and find out some information was all he 
> needed right now.  Still his tail inches forward, now hanging jsut 
> above FZ's foot ready to nail down and infect FZ's fuel lines with a 
> microbot of control.  Halucigens to favourite attacks were in place 
> and he almost had the better hand.
